title: Company Module
description: Through the buttons below, you can view and edit the organizational structure of the relevant company, which includes the department list and representatives, as well as the physical or electronic assets belonging to the company. You can make changes to the organizational structure to grant access rights to users or remove existing permissions. Additionally, updates on asset cards will be directly reflected in the storage areas list found in data processing cards.

organization.title: Organizational Structure
organization.description: In this section, you can edit your company's departments and department representatives.

assetList.title: Asset List
assetList.description: In this section, you can edit the applications used in your company and other storage areas.
